means: 好像，仿佛（ seem的第三人称单数 ）

PerfectNetExp.abs: and the morning seems so gray ., 清晨看来如此灰暗.
he seems to know a lot about it ., 他貌似知道很多.

this seems surprising since most readers , actively reading work documents , newspapers , magazines , books or the contents of a computer display are practicing daily for at least one hour .这位老人拐着手杖走路.
英语作文模板 ... (补充说明). it ______________(进一步的说明). seems (给出细节). my.

list.abs: but all I seem to do is fetch and carry for her ., 她雇佣我为她的私人助理 , 但我似乎要做的一切是替她打杂.
well , they seem to be missing ., 噢 , 他们似乎失踪了.
人教版八年级下册英语重点短语 -... ... 12. get mad 生气，感到恼火 14. seem like 看上去像…… 17. in public places 在公众场合.
you seem too wanna hurt me ., 你似乎想伤害我.

entry.def: You use seem to say that someone or something gives the impression of having a particular quality, or of happening in the way you describe.

example.ex: We heard a series of explosions. They seemed quite close by...
example.tran: 我们听到一连串的爆炸声，似乎就在附近。
除了我们，大家好像都很忙碌。

entry.tran: (在描述自己的感觉、想法、经历时用于缓和语气)好像，似乎
entry.def: You use seem when you are describing your own feelings or thoughts, or describing something that has happened to you, in order to make your statement less forceful.

example.ex: I seem to have lost all my self-confidence...
I seem to remember giving you very precise instructions...
example.tran: 我好像记得给过你非常明确的指示。

entry.def: If you say that you cannot seem or could not seem to do something, you mean that you have tried to do it and were unable to.

example.ex: No matter how hard I try I cannot seem to catch up on all the bills...
example.tran: 无论怎么努力，我好像就是无法付清所有的账单。

example.ex: Kim's mother couldn't seem to stop crying.
example.tran: 金的母亲似乎要哭个没完。

auth_sentence.content: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Re-Up also seems to have an ulterior motive.

auth_sentence.content: It seems to me a frivolous way to behave.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems to me a frivolous way to behave.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems to me a frivolous way to behave.

auth_sentence.content: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.
auth_sentence.res_content: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The King's spirit seems to drift across Beware.

Sentence.sentence: Under these circumstances, it's natural to look for what may appear to be the most "practical" way out of the problem "Major in a subject designed to get you a job" seems the obvious answer to some, though this ignores the fact that many disciplines in the humanities characterized as "soft" often, in fact, lead to employment and success in the long run.
The author of this report seems to be against too much government interference in the economy.
Although it hardly seems practical to trick ourselves into eating less.

It seems very good for Harvard to honor such a high profile popularizer of the irrational…… at a time when political and religious nonsense so jeopardize the rule of reason in this allegedly enlightened democracy and around the world.

But at a time when the American factory seems to be a shrinking presence, and when good manufacturing jobs have vanished, perhaps never to return, there is something deeply troubling about this dilution of American craftsmanship.
The damage to American craftsmanship seems to parallel the steep slide in manufacturing employment
